Line1.6DE47: He gave everything. His home. His son. What was it for?
Line19.BAE4: This fiend...helped me escape from Lilith.
Line29.6DE47: Wait...I’ve read of such a wolf...
Line35.BD9D3: Trust had no part in it. Your friend saw reason instead.
Line41.BD9D3: No proposals. I offer only my aid. This leads to the Cathedral of Hatred.
Line43.BD9D3: But you must hurry. Lilith is almost there.
Line45.BD9D3: As should you. If Lilith takes my essence, Sanctuary is lost.
VoiceDir1.6DE47: (on the verge of tears, voice cracking)
VoiceDir29.6DE47: (Considering, then gasping in revelation after dialog)
